WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS 09 THRU 15 FEB
   BY M/V HAI YANG SHI YOU 720 TOWING TEN
   11112 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   20-30S 038-50W, 20-27S 039-22W,
   20-13S 039-21W, 20-18S 038-50W
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 300/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 15 FEB 21.
